instructions.title: 1st Passage: Jackie Robinson (Digital)
instructions.prompt: For this passage, you will read the content in digital form (using the computer). You will answer a series of questions in the computer. For the MOOCA, each question correspond to a passage. As you answer questions, you will NOT be able to return to previous questions. Make sure before proceeding to the next question that your answer is final.

questions.prompt: Write a brief summary of the reading. Include A) the main idea of the passage, B) a list of key points, and C) any other relevant information you might remember. You may list your thoughts in phrases or sentences. There is no need to write a paragraph.
April 15th is celebrated in baseball as Jackie Robinson Day because on that day, he:
answers: finished his service in the Army and was honorably discharged.
became the first African-American professional baseball player of the 20th century.
started the Brooklyn Dodgers baseball team.
had played for every baseball team in Major League Baseball.
